message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split reflects the situation well.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice. Time is ticking and we both lose if this drags on.
Bob, my offer is still the most reasonable. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more rounds and we're both just losing money.
